description.narrative: To support capacity building and technical assistance, as well as the development of productive farming activities and family investment plans, to support the members of the cooperative.

• Preparation of young members in the internal control system that supports and controls the activities of the Fair Market organic certification process of the production of the members of the cooperative. • Preparation and execution of information collection in relation to family investment plans in each of the partners with the purpose of contributing in order to plan the social and economic development of the production units in the short, medium and long term. • Strengthening of management bodies on the different roles within their organization. • Contribute to principles of cooperativism: transparency, democracy, unity, etc., economic and organizational reporting.
